items.name: Heat Sauce
items.description: Some like it hot and Dean’s “Dead Heat” is the most outrageous of hot sauces! Not for the faint of heart. You’ve been warned!

items.description: Everyone loves Dean’s specialty sauces and now they’re available right from our Cantina!

items.name: Dean’s T-Shirt
items.description: You’ll love our unisex Sport-Tek Dri Fit shirts. Dean’s Hot Pepper is printed on the front; the three Parrot Amigos are printed on the back.

items.name: Womens V-Neck
items.description: Ladies, try our V-neck Dri Fit shirts. Dean’s Hot Pepper is printed on the front; the three Parrot Amigos are printed on the back.
